member.name: T:Exul.Core.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Exul.Core.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Exul.Core.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Exul.Core.Properties.Resources.BaseTypeRequiredError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The argument should be inherited from the required base type. Required base type: {0}. Actual base type: {1}..

member.name: P:Exul.Core.Properties.Resources.ElementIndexIsOutOfRangeError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The index is out of the expected range. Expected range: [{0},{1}]. Actual value: {2}..

member.name: P:Exul.Core.Properties.Resources.EmptyCollectionError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The collection is empty..

member.name: P:Exul.Core.Properties.Resources.GenericTypeDefinitionError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Value of the parameter is generic type definition that isn't supported. Actual type name: {0}..

member.name: P:Exul.Core.Properties.Resources.InterfaceRequiredError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The argument should implement the required interface. Required interface: {0}..

member.name: P:Exul.Core.Properties.Resources.InvalidSizeError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The size parameter is negative or equal to zero. Actual value: {0}..

member.name: P:Exul.Core.Properties.Resources.MissingParameterError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The required parameter is not provided. Parameter name: {0}..

member.name: P:Exul.Core.Properties.Resources.NoEnoughElementsError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The specified collection contains no enough elements. Expected size: {0}. Actual size: {1}..

member.name: P:Exul.Core.Properties.Resources.NonComparableTypeError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Specified type has no default comparer and a custom comparer is not provided. Actual type: {0}..

member.name: P:Exul.Core.Properties.Resources.ParameterTypeError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The argument should have the expected type. Expected type: {0}. Actual type: {1}..

member.name: T:Exul.Core.Properties.ResourceHelper
member.summary: Provides helper methods to work with resources.

The max acceptable value.
